description: This file is a shell script that implements a command-line interface for managing OCI containers through curl-based JSON-RPC calls. It includes functions for starting, stopping, listing, and controlling containers, and provides a menu-driven 'main' loop for user interaction.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts an OCI container from a bundled directory or tarball based on user input.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts an OCI container using a Dobby specification JSON file.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container identified by container ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command within a specified container.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information about available commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main interactive loop that prompts user for commands and executes container management functions.
